bibl.title: The Last Years of Cyrus, Patriarch of Alexandria († 642).
Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P.Gascou)

bibl.note: Examines the final years (c. 636-42) of the Chalcedonian patriarch Cyrus of Alexandria. - From tribute to trial. - The reinstatement and double death of Cyrus. - The Constantinopolitan source. - Hawks and doves at Constantinople. - The unionist revival. - Martina and the miaphysites. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Phil Booth, The Last Years of Cyrus, Patriarch of Alexandria († 642).
Jean-Luc Fournet & Arietta Papaconstantinou (edd.), Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P. Gascou) = TravMém 20 (2016) 1, pp. 509-558, 1 tabl.; - 656.

Examines the final years (c. 636-42) of the Chalcedonian patriarch Cyrus of Alexandria. - From tribute to trial. - The reinstatement and double death of Cyrus. - The Constantinopolitan source. - Hawks and doves at Constantinople. - The unionist revival. - Martina and the miaphysites. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
